item.title: 2015: An Aerial Montage - 6 mins
item.description:
2015: An Aerial Montage - 6 mins

2015 was the year of the Phantom 3, when DJI cannibalized their own Phantom 2 Vision 2+ system with a lower priced, highly superior Phantom 3 Advanced and Professional. And boy what a difference a year makes. It's seriously impressive what this sub $1000 piece of equipment can do.

item.title: 90º North - Journey to the North Pole
item.description:
90º North - Journey to the North Pole

Featuring drone footage of the polar ice cap, polar bears, and incredible icebreaking, come along for the journey as our ship, '50 Let Pobedy' or '50 years of Victory', the worlds largest nuclear powered icebreaker at 160M long and 25,000tn, takes us to the geographic north pole earlier than any planned voyage in history.

item.title: Kirkwood Flight - 1 min 20 sec
item.description:
Kirkwood Flight - 1 min 20 sec

Testing Drone in Sierras. First flight in snow, first above 10,000 ft (takeoff elevation). Thanks to Dom for helping with logistics on this one.

item.title: Dragon Gorge Flight - 2 min
item.description:
Dragon Gorge Flight - 2 min

On the morning of Guy and Kelly's wedding, we take the to skies above 龙庆峡 (Dragon Gorge), in YanQing County, near Beijing. Thanks to Miki Sivan for letting me film his Phantom 3 in motion as part of this production.

item.title: Pacific Rollers
item.description:
Pacific Rollers

My first experiment with widescreen 21:9 format in order to highlight the beautiful waves. Huge pacific rollers crashing onto the coast have been epic this winter.
